name: Wilderness' wrath
description:
You're in a car crash for a few days, you were unconscious for all this time. But you grab you heart and try to make it to your home which is quite hard to find...

The first thing you should do, is to click travel, and to go to the nearest place, there you could click "Travel" and press "Take a look around" to search for items.

Make fire, boil water, catch fish and other cool stuff. From some animals you can make a nice soup.

The weather is changing and with it, the day heat also changes, so try not to freeze till death !

The game needs a lot of polishing, but I couldn't make it in time for the game jam. The video is a bit laggy because of the screen recorder.

Tab - stats menu

i - inventory
